name: Construire un chatbot bas√© sur la r√©cup√©ration avec Telegram, OpenAI et sauvegarde PDF sur Google Drive
description:
# üìö Chatbot RAG Telegram avec document PDF & sauvegarde Google Drive
- Un chatbot de g√©n√©ration augment√©e par r√©cup√©ration (RAG) am√©lior√© construit dans **n8n** qui permet aux utilisateurs de poser des questions via Telegram et de recevoir des r√©ponses pr√©cises √† partir de PDF t√©l√©charg√©s. Il int√®gre des documents en utilisant OpenAI et les sauvegarde sur Google Drive.

## üë§ Pour qui est-ce

Parfait pour :
- Les travailleurs du savoir qui souhaitent un acc√®s instantan√© √† des documents priv√©s
- Les √©quipes de support ayant besoin de SOP et de guides consultables
- Les √©ducateurs permettant des questions-r√©ponses sur le mat√©riel de cours pour les √©tudiants
- Les particuliers automatisant la recherche de documents personnels + sauvegarde dans le cloud

## ‚öôÔ∏è Comment √ßa fonctionne / Ce que √ßa fait

### üí¨ Gestion des chats Telegram
1. **L'utilisateur envoie un message**  
   D√©clench√© par le bot Telegram, le flux de travail v√©rifie si le message est du texte.

2. **Message texte ‚Üí Agent RAG OpenAI**  
   Si le message est du texte, il est transmis √† un agent de document aliment√© par GPT.  
   Cet agent :
   - R√©cup√®re des informations pertinentes √† partir des documents int√©gr√©s en utilisant la recherche s√©mantique
   - Renvoie une r√©ponse contextuelle √† l'utilisateur

3. **Envoyer la r√©ponse**  
   Le bot envoie la r√©ponse g√©n√©r√©e √† l'utilisateur de Telegram.

4. **Fallback pour les entr√©es non textuelles**  
   Si le message n'est pas du texte, le bot r√©pond avec un message poli indiquant que ce n'est pas pris en charge.

### üìÑ T√©l√©chargement et int√©gration de PDF
1. **L'utilisateur t√©l√©charge des PDF manuellement**  
   Un d√©clencheur manuel d√©marre le flux d'int√©gration.

2. **Chargeur de donn√©es par d√©faut**  
   Lit et divise le(s) PDF en segments de texte.

3. **Insertion dans le magasin de vecteurs (Int√©gration)**  
   Les segments de texte sont int√©gr√©s en utilisant OpenAI et sauvegard√©s pour la r√©cup√©ration.

4. **Sauvegarde sur Google Drive**  
   Le PDF original est t√©l√©charg√© sur Google Drive pour la conservation.

## üõ†Ô∏è Comment configurer

1. **Bot Telegram**
   - Cr√©ez via [BotFather](https://t.me/botfather)
   - Connectez-le au n≈ìud de d√©clenchement Telegram

2. **OpenAI**
   - Utilisez votre cl√© API OpenAI
   - Connectez les n≈ìuds d'int√©gration et de mod√®le de chat (GPT-3.5/4)
   - Assurez-vous que l'int√©gration et la requ√™te utilisent le m√™me n≈ìud d'int√©gration

3. **Google Drive**
   - Configurez les identifiants dans n8n pour votre compte Google
   - Connectez le n≈ìud ‚ÄúSauvegarde sur Google Drive‚Äù

4. **Ingestion de PDF**
   - Utilisez le d√©clencheur ‚ÄúT√©l√©chargez votre PDF ici‚Äù
   - Connectez-le au chargeur, √† l'int√©grateur et au flux de sauvegarde

## ‚úÖ Exigences

- Jeton de bot Telegram
- Cl√© API OpenAI (GPT + Int√©grations)
- Instance n8n (auto-h√©berg√©e ou cloud)
- Int√©gration Google Drive
- Fichiers PDF √† t√©l√©charger

## üß© Comment personnaliser le flux de travail

| Fonctionnalit√©                     | Comment personnaliser                                                  |
|------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Auto-ingestion depuis des dossiers  | Ajoutez des observateurs Google Drive/Dropbox pour de nouveaux PDF    |
| Ajouter le t√©l√©chargement de fichiers via Telegram | √âtendez le bot Telegram pour recevoir des PDF et ex√©cuter le flux d'int√©gration |
| Suivre les questions des utilisateurs | Enregistrez les noms d'utilisateur Telegram et les questions dans une base de donn√©es |
| R√©sumer des documents               | Ajoutez une √©tape de r√©sum√© lors du t√©l√©chargement                     |
| Ajouter un support Markdown ou HTML  | Formatez les r√©ponses pour un meilleur rendu sur Telegram              |

workflow.name: Telegram RAG Chatbot with PDF Document & Google Drive Backup

parameters.toolDescription: Use this knowledge base to answer questions from the user

parameters.content:
### Embeddings

The Insert and Retrieve operation use the same embedding node.

This is to ensure that they are using the **exact same embeddings and settings**.

Different embeddings might not work at all, or have unintended consequences.

parameters.text: Sorry, I can‚Äôt read files or images right now. Just send me your question about uploaded document, and I‚Äôll help you answer it!

options.systemMessage: The output should not exceed 3000 characters after entities parsing.

parameters.content:
### 2. Is Text Message?  
**Description**: Checks whether the incoming Telegram message is a text message. If not, the workflow routes to an "unsupported message type" handler.

### 1. üì© Telegram Trigger  
**Description**: Listens for incoming messages from the user via the connected Telegram bot. This is the entry point of the workflow.

parameters.formTitle: Upload your data to test RAG

parameters.content:
# üìö Telegram RAG Chatbot with PDF Document & Google Drive Backup
- An upgraded Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbot built in **n8n** that lets users ask questions via Telegram and receive accurate answers from uploaded PDFs. It embeds documents using OpenAI and backs them up to Google Drive.

## üë§ Who‚Äôs it for

Perfect for:
- Knowledge workers who want instant access to private documents
- Support teams needing searchable SOPs and guides
- Educators enabling course material Q&A for students
- Individuals automating personal document search + cloud backup

## ‚öôÔ∏è How it works / What it does

### üí¨ Telegram Chat Handling
1. **User sends a message**  
   Triggered by the Telegram bot, the workflow checks if the message is text.

2. **Text message ‚Üí OpenAI RAG Agent**  
   If the message is text, it's passed to a GPT-powered document agent.  
   This agent:
   - Retrieves relevant info from embedded documents using semantic search
   - Returns a context-aware answer to the user

3. **Send answer back**  
   The bot sends the generated response back to the Telegram user.

4. **Non-text input fallback**  
   If the message is not text, the bot replies with a polite unsupported message.

### üìÑ PDF Upload and Embedding
1. **User uploads PDFs manually**  
   A manual trigger starts the embedding flow.

2. **Default Data Loader**  
   Reads and chunks the PDF(s) into text segments.

3. **Insert to Vector Store (Embedding)**  
   Text chunks are embedded using OpenAI and saved for retrieval.

4. **Backup to Google Drive**  
   The original PDF is uploaded to Google Drive for safekeeping.

## üõ†Ô∏è How to set up

1. **Telegram Bot**
   - Create via [BotFather](https://t.me/botfather)
   - Connect it to the Telegram Trigger node

2. **OpenAI**
   - Use your OpenAI API key
   - Connect the Embeddings and Chat Model nodes (GPT-3.5/4)
   - Ensure both embedding and querying use the same Embedding node

3. **Google Drive**
   - Set up credentials in n8n for your Google account
   - Connect the ‚ÄúBackup to Google Drive‚Äù node

4. **PDF Ingestion**
   - Use the ‚ÄúUpload your PDF here‚Äù trigger
   - Connect it to the loader, embedder, and backup flow

## ‚úÖ Requirements

- Telegram bot token
- OpenAI API key (GPT + Embeddings)
- n8n instance (self-hosted or cloud)
- Google Drive integration
- PDF files to upload

## üß© How to customize the workflow

| Feature                        | How to Customize                                                  |
|-------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Auto-ingest from folders       | Add Google Drive/Dropbox watchers for new PDFs                   |
| Add file upload via Telegram   | Extend Telegram bot to receive PDFs and run the embedding flow   |
| Track user questions           | Log Telegram usernames and questions to a database               |
| Summarize documents            | Add summarization step on upload                                 |
| Add Markdown or HTML support   | Format replies for better Telegram rendering                     |

Built with üí¨ Telegram + üìÑ PDF + üß† OpenAI Embeddings + ‚òÅÔ∏è Google Drive + ‚ö° n8n

### 1. Upload Your PDF Document Here  
- A manual execution trigger for uploading and processing PDF documents into the knowledge base.

### 2.1 Backup Documents to Google Drive  
- Uploads a copy of the original PDF file to a connected Google Drive folder for safekeeping and future reference.

### 3. Telegram Document Query Agent (GPT with RAG)  
- Sends the user‚Äôs text message to OpenAI‚Äôs Chat Model. Uses embeddings to retrieve relevant document chunks and generate a context-aware response using Retrieval-Augmented Generation.

### Default Data Loader  
Extracts and chunks text from the uploaded PDF documents to prepare them for semantic embedding.

### 2.2 Insert Data to Store (Embeddings)  
Converts document chunks into vector embeddings using OpenAI and inserts them into the vector store for future retrieval.

user.name: Trung Tran
user.bio: Empowering small and medium businesses with smart automation and practical AI, no big tech team required. Youtube channel: youtube.com/@theStackExplorer

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
